General.Name: Wuhan East Lake High Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuhan East Lake High Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in engineering construction, environmental protection technology, and technology parks businesses. It is involved in the investment, development, construction, operation, and maintenance of highways, large bridges, municipal infrastructure, and other related projects; and investment, development, construction, and operation of technology parks. The company also engages in the investment, development, construction, operation, and maintenance of environmental protection projects, such as flue gas treatment, urban sewage treatment, lake water purification, ecological restoration, solid waste treatment, new energy, and other environmental protection projects; and sale, installation, and commissioning of waste incineration flue gas treatment equipment. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Wuhan, China.
General.Address: East Lake High-tech Building, Wuhan, China, 430074
